de.unifrankfurt.texttechnologie.olympia
Class MedalHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      de.unifrankfurt.texttechnologie.olympia.MedalHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class MedalHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler

A DefaultHandler for the SAXParser to handle medals of the Olympic Games.

Author:
Benjamin Bronder, Timo Homburg
